00047 // Implementation des fonctions de la classe Masse_VDF_Elem

00051 
00052 DoubleTab& Masse_VDF_Elem::appliquer_impl(DoubleTab& sm) const
00053 {
00054   const Zone_VDF& zone_VDF = la_zone_VDF.valeur();
00055   const DoubleVect& volumes = zone_VDF.volumes();
00056   const DoubleVect& porosite_elem = zone_VDF.porosite_elem();
00057   int nb_elem = zone_VDF.nb_elem();
00058   if(nb_elem==0)
00059     {
00060       sm.echange_espace_virtuel();
00061       return sm;
00062     }
00063   int nb_comp = sm.size()/nb_elem;
00064   int nb_dim=sm.nb_dim();
00065   assert((nb_comp*nb_elem == sm.size())||(nb_dim==3));
00066   if (nb_dim == 1)
00067     for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem; num_elem++)
00068       sm(num_elem) /= (volumes(num_elem)*porosite_elem(num_elem));
00069   else if (nb_dim == 2)
00070     {
00071       for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem; num_elem++)
00072         for (int k=0; k<nb_comp; k++)
00073           sm(num_elem,k) /= (volumes(num_elem)*porosite_elem(num_elem));
00074     }
00075   else if (sm.nb_dim() == 3)
00076     {
00077 // int d0=sm.dimension(0);
00078       int d1=sm.dimension(1);
00079       int d2=sm.dimension(2);
00080       for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem; num_elem++)
00081         for (int k=0; k<d1; k++)
00082           for (int d=0; d<d2; d++)
00083             sm(num_elem,k,d) /= (volumes(num_elem)*porosite_elem(num_elem));
00084     }
00085   else
00086     {
00087       Cerr<< "Masse_VDF_Elem::appliquer ne peut pas s'appliquer a un DoubleTab a "<<sm.nb_dim()<<" dimensions"<<finl;
00088       assert(0);
00089       exit();
00090     }
00091   sm.echange_espace_virtuel();
00092   return sm;
00093 }
00094 
00095 void Masse_VDF_Elem::associer_zone_dis_base(const Zone_dis_base& la_zone_dis_base)
00096 {
00097   la_zone_VDF = ref_cast(Zone_VDF, la_zone_dis_base);
00098 }
00099

00101 {
00102   la_zone_Cl_VDF = ref_cast(Zone_Cl_VDF, la_zone_Cl_dis_base);
00103 }
